title: Crashing mid-game "Error 183"
body: I get at least one crash per game, forcing me to close the game. It says "error 183 unable to create file dump" or something like that.

replies.body:
Hey Easybake!

This is usually an issue with Graphics drivers crashing while in game. Installing the newest versions of your graphics drivers should resolve your issue! You can do that by downloading and running the drivers from AMD's website [here](http://support.amd.com/en-us/download/desktop?os=Windows%208%20-%2064). 

Please let me know if this works for you!
What if it is just random DC's and lag? My internet is fine but I can't seem to find a problem. I'm just wondering if there's any explanation? Thanks!

For issues like that, I recommend you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the following information:

- [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)
- [Network Info Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
- [Process list](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

A while ago I had a similar problem, which is now fixed. However the only solution that you guys could come up with is to remove my antivirus, which didn't work. Then I replied again and said the problem still existed. Then I got told to remove another program. Didn't work. if I reply again, am I going to be told to remove another program or something else?

> [{quoted}](name=Digital Ram,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ar8pLe4x,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-26T20:05:21.890+0000)
>
> Hey Easybake!
> 
> This is usually an issue with Graphics drivers crashing while in game. Installing the newest versions of your graphics drivers should resolve your issue! You can do that by downloading and running the drivers from AMD's website [here](http://support.amd.com/en-us/download/desktop?os=Windows%208%20-%2064). 
> 
> Please let me know if this works for you!

I Thought I would mention this but When the Riot employee sys It is usually an issue with the Graphics driver it sounds like you have no clue what it is; I don't expect you to know how to fix it because you can't possibly know when you have no way to inspect the computer or to diagnose the problem from. Plus This problem Only happens when I am Running Curse while playing the game when Curse is not running he Game does not crash at all. AMD has not released a update for there drivers that where not Beta since December witch is really annoying. This Has nearly cost me my Promotion in ranked.{{champion:62}}

It looks like he/she has the default windows drivers installed for their graphics card, which many graphics cards cannot use with League. Uninstalling these (if needed) and installing the latest version directly from the manufactures website will likely fix the issue.
